name: horizon
title: Horizon
desc: A free photography theme for Astro V5 with pricing, portfolios, testimonials, and more. Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4.
article:
Save weeks of time and get a photography portfolio website up and running in a snap.

Horizon is the perfect way to showcase those photography skills. Itâs built on Astro with Tailwind CSS for styling.

Features

  • Astro V5 compatible
  • Incredibly easy navbar configuration, with dropdown support
  • Admonition / Callout component
  • Portfolio, testimonials, and other pages content collections
  • Sitemap and relevant SEO metadata
  • View Transitions enabled
  • Built-in image optimization with astro:assets

github.name: horizon
github.description: A free and open source photography websites template by Cosmic Themes. Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS.
